name: The Creature Island
description:
A Game about making friends.

Collect fruits and feed them to all the creatures on the island and pet them to make real friends.

It's a bit slow and there are a lot of bugs, but you might get through it.

Creature design and art by Roseshwimpy - https://www.instagram.com/shwimpycrafts/

There are still some placeholder graphics.

Made for the Jester Jam 2
